Notes: Partner with Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department to provide School Resource Officers (SROs) to the District

We have two School Resource Officers (SROs) in GUSD. The SROs, who are officers of the Glendora Police Department (GPD), form relationships with students, provide intervention to assist students and assist staff with difficult situations.

The school works with the South Pasadena Police Department and has a School Resource Officer available for support.

The El Monte Union High School District is working with the El Monte Police and Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Departments to bring specially and highly trained non-aggressive canines or “detection dogs” onto our high school campuses throughout the school year to deter students from bringing contraband substances to school.
